item.title: TSM
item.description: score:28 Chances: The Nikkei Stock Average ended 2.2% higher at 39098.68, a fresh high above the previous record closing of 38915.87 set in December 1989. Japan’s efforts to rebuild its semiconductor industry are getting a shot in the arm as more and more Taiwanese chip companies expand in the region, excited about the Japanese sector’s prospects.
